messages.content: Can you give me a side by side desciption of the following code in a table, where on the left is the code and on the right the desciption. And please use proper spacing and | to make it terminal friendly: #!/bin/shecho"CheckFWNow..."fwinfo="/tmp/fwinfo.xml"model="`xmldbc-g/runtime/device/modelname`"srv="wrpd.dlink.com.tw"reqstr="/router/firmware/query.asp"old_major=`cat/etc/config/buildver|cut-d'.'-f1`old_minor=`cat/etc/config/buildver|cut-d'.'-f2|cut-c1-2`buildver="_0"$old_major$old_minorglobal="Bx_Default_FW"$buildverreqstr=$reqstr"?model=$model_$global"reqstr="GET$reqstrHTTP/1.1Accept:*/*User-Agent:Mozilla/4.0(compatible;MSIE6.0;WindowsNT5.1;SV1)Host:$srvConnection:Close"rm-f$fwinfoxmldbc-X/runtime/firmware#echo"tcprequest"$reqstr""$srv"80-f"$fwinfo"-t5-s"`tcprequest"$reqstr""$srv"80-f"$fwinfo"-t5-s`if[-f$fwinfo];then#getfirmwareinformationnew_major=`grepMajor/tmp/fwinfo.xml|sed's/^[	]*//'|sed's/<Major>//'|sed's/</Major>//'`new_minor=`grepMinor/tmp/fwinfo.xml|sed's/^[	]*//'|sed's/<Minor>//'|sed's/</Minor>//'`if["$new_major"!=""]||["$new_minor"!=""];thenxmldbc-s/runtime/firmware/fwversion/Major$new_majorxmldbc-s/runtime/firmware/fwversion/Minor$new_minorfifiif["$new_major"!=""];thenif[$new_major-gt$old_major-o$new_major-eq$old_major-a$new_minor-gt$old_minor];thenecho"HavenewFirmware"xmldbc-s/runtime/firmware/havenewfirmware1fifi
